title: MerchantSku
description: This schema represents a merchant SKU

merchantSku.description:
Your unique identifier for each product you sell on Jet

			#Valid Values

			1 to 40 characters

productTitle.description:
Short product description

			#Valid Values

			1 to 500 alphanumeric characters

jetBrowseNodeId.description:
The uniqueID that defines where the product will be found on Jet.com browse structure

			#Valid Values

			This must be a valid jetBrowseNodeId

standardProductCode.description:
A standard, unique identifier for a product.  ISBN, UPC, EAN and GTIN-14 are accepted.

			#Valid Values

			*If standardProductCodeType is'UPC' - must be 12 digits

			*If standardProductCodeType is 'ISBN' - must be 13 digits

			*If standardProductCodeType is 'EAN' - must be 13 digits

			*If standardProductCodeType is 'GTIN-14' - must be 14 digits

standardProductCodeType.description:
Indicate the type of StandardProductCode that was used.

			#Valid Values

			*UPC

			*ISBN

			*EAN

			*GTIN-14

multipackQuantity.description: Number of items with the given StandardProductCode (UPC) that makes up your Merchant SKU

brand.description:
Brand of the Merchant SKU

			#Valid Values

			1 to 50 characters

manufacturer.description:
Manufacturer of the Merchant SKU

			#Valid Values

			1 to 50 characters

mfrPartNumber.description:
Part number provided by the original manufacturer of the Merchant SKU

			#Valid Values

			maximum of 50 characters

productDescription.description:
Long description of the Merchant SKU

			#Valid Values

			1 to 2000 characters

bullet1.description:
Merchant SKU feature description

			#Valid Values

			maximum of 500 characters

bullet2.description:
Merchant SKU feature description

			#Valid Values

			maximum of 500 characters

bullet3.description:
Merchant SKU feature description

			#Valid Values

			maximum of 500 characters

bullet4.description:
Merchant SKU feature description

			#Valid Values

			maximum of 500 characters

bullet5.description:
Merchant SKU feature description

			#Valid Values

			maximum of 500 characters

numberUnitsForPricePerUnit.description: For Price Per Unit calculations, the number of units included in the merchant SKU. The unit of measure must be specified in order to indicate what is being measured by the unit-count.

typeOfUnitForPricePerUnit.description: The Type of Unit for Price per Unit attribute is a label for the Number Units for Price Per Unit. The price per unit can then be constructed by dividing the selling price by the number of units and appending the text "per unit value." For example, for a six-pack of soda, Number Units for Price per Unit= 6, Type of Unit for Price per Unit= can, price per unit = price per can.

shippingWeightPounds.description:
Weight of the merchant SKU when in its shippable configuration

			#Valid Values

			A number with 2 decimals

packageLengthInches.description:
Length of the merchant SKU when in its shippable configuration

			#Valid Values

			A number with 2 decimals

packageWidthInches.description:
Width of the merchant SKU when in its shippable configuration

			#Valid Values

			A number with 2 decimals

packageHeightInches.description:
Height of the merchant SKU when in its shippable configuration

			#Valid Values

			A number with 2 decimals

parentOrChild.description:
Define is sellerSKU is 'Parent' or 'Child'

			#Logic

			This field is required if you are setting up a Variation relationship between a set SellerSKUs

			##Valid Values

			*Parent

			*Child

parentSku.description:
The "SellerSKU" that is the parent for this SellerSKU which has "ParentOrChild" = Child

			#Logic

			This field is required if you are setting up a Variation relationship between a set SellerSKUs

			#Valid Values

			This should be a 'SellerSKU' with 'parentOrChild' = 'parent'

relationship.description:
Variation or Accessory

			#Logic

			This field is required if you are setting up a Variation relationship between a set SellerSKUs

			##Valid Values

			*Variation

			*Accessory

variationRefinements.description:
The refinements that vary for a set  of Parent/Child SellerSKUs

			#Logic

			This field is required if you are setting up a Variation relationship between a set SellerSKUs
			
			#Valid Values

			The valid 'variationRefinements vary depending on the jetBrowseNodeId, see category specific documentation for details

prop65.description: You must tell us if your product is subject to Proposition 65 rules and regulations.  Proposition 65 requires merchants to provide California consumers with special warnings for products that contain chemicals known to cause cancer, birth defects, or other reproductive harm, if those products expose consumers to such materials above certain threshold levels.  The default value for this is "False," so if you do not populate this column, we will assume your product is not subject to this rule.  Please view this Web site for more information: http://www.oehha.ca.gov/.

legalDisclaimerDescription.description:
Any legal language required to be displayed with the product.

			#Valid Values

			maximum of 500 characters

cpsiaCautionaryStatement1.description:
Use this field to indicate if a cautionary statement relating to the choking hazards of children's toys and games applies to your product.  These cautionary statements are defined in Section 24 of the Federal Hazardous Substances Act and Section 105 of the Consumer Product Safety Improvement Act of 2008.  They must be displayed on the product packaging and in certain online and catalog advertisements.  You are responsible for determining if a cautionary statement applies to the product.  This can be verified by contacting the product manufacturer or checking the product packaging.   Cautionary statements that you select will be displayed on the product detail page.  If no cautionary statement applies to the product, select "no_warning_applicable".

			#Valid Values

			*Choking hazard balloon

			*choking hazard contains a marble

			*choking hazard contains a small balloon

			*choking hazard is a marble

			*choking hazard is a small balloon

			*choking hazard small parts

			*no warning applicable

			#Valid Values

			*choking hazard contains a small balloon

countryOfOrigin.description:
The country that the item was manufactured in.

			#Valid Values

			maximum of 50 characters

safetyWarning.description:
If applicable, use to supply any associated warnings for your product.

			#Valid Values

			maximum of 500 characters
